reuters.title: <PANTRY INC> INB TALKS ON BEING ACQUIRED
reuters.body: Privately-held Pantry Inc, which operates 477 convenience stores in five Southeastern states, said it has engaged Alex. Brown and Sons Inc <ABSB> to explore a possbile sale of the company. It said it expects to start talks with prospective acquirers shortly. The company said it has been approached by a number of parties in recent months. Reuter 
